title: Liqui Tech Finish First Auto Polish (16 oz.)
features: Contains No Wax, Silicone or Teflon
Developed Using Recently Developed Synthetic Polymer Technology
Durable, Weather Resistant, Polymer Layer Enhances Gloss
Chemically Bonds to Surface to Help Fill in Swirl Marks
description: The high-performance polymer applies effortlessly to fill in the microscopic pores in the clear coat/painted surface. The polymer molecules are able to chemically bond to the surface, which provides your vehicle with a dynamic and durable barrier to resist tar, tree sap, acid rain, road salt, and other environmental contaminants. Unlike a wax, this performance characteristic allows Finish First Polish to remove light scratches and swirl marks while leaving a perfectly smooth surface and a brilliant mirror-like shine. Finish First Polish will not haze, crack, chip or peel. It is safe to use on painted surfaces; acrylic, enamel, metallic, clear coat, fiberglass, and any other hard, non-porous surface. After several applications of Finish First Polish, all it takes is a quick wash to remove even the most stubborn elements. This versatile polish can also be used within the home on stovetops, bathroom tile, mirrors, windows, and fixtures.
